<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}> Update Custom Rule</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"put"} path={"/api/v32.03/custom-rules/{id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



```
x-prisma-cloud-target-env: {"permission":"policyCustomRules","saas":true,"self-hosted":true}
x-public: true
```



UpdateCustomRule creates/edits a custom rule


## Request
